thread.title: This is the totally gross moment a woman pulls her trousers down and POOS on a packed bus
thread.title_full: This is the totally gross moment a woman pulls her trousers down and POOS on a packed bus

author: amaloney
title: This is the totally gross moment a woman pulls her trousers down and POOS on a packed bus
text:
Mrs Crunch Bus-ting to go This is the totally gross moment a woman pulls her trousers down and POOS on a packed bus 
Horrified commuters filmed the passenger as she squatted at the front of the bus By Alison Maloney 18th February 2017, 11:10 am THE gross moment a woman “squatted down and pooed” on a crowded bus has been captured on camera. 
The woman appears to have been caught short on a Hong Kong commuter bus – and is seen squatting down with her trousers pulled down. digitalpictures-sm@thesun.co.uk Passengers filmed the woman as she squatted down 

Several passengers are heard expressing their disgust at the woman and even the fact that many of them are filming doesn’t put her off. 
A caption alongside the video says the woman was desperate and had to empty her bowels as “a matter of urgency”. 
The clip has been uploaded to LiveLeak.com and YouTube where it has been thousands of times. 
The defecating woman is not the first to be caught short in public. 
Last year, one disgusting shopper was ever filmed doing a poo in a supermarket FRIDGE.
